title: Captive-Sated
description: What happens when a woman is forced into captivity, and against her will, she falls in love with her captor? What happens when she lets her guard down, only to find out that the man who stole her heart isn't who she thought he was?Captive-Sated is part of a series in which each book is a stand-alone, dark tale of forbidden love. In each of these novels, strong women and alpha men are inexplicably drawn to one another in the most turbulent of circumstances, no matter how much they try to resist. Each book in the series depicts two people who overcome the odds stacked against them and thrive in a relationship others might consider dysfunctional or taboo. They become so wrapped up in each other that no one else can satisfy their hunger withinâ€¦ They become Captive-Sated.This is the first stand-alone book in the Captive-Sated series.
author: Suzanne Steele
